summary:
Sethai and Elthrai Horse Armors
Two summonable horses with heavy armor.
descriptionHtml:
Sethai and Elthrai Horse Armors

The summon spells are purchasable in Witherun by Farengar.

You can also type in the console:  help \"Sethai or Elthrai\" 4
to find the horse npc ID
Then: player.placeatme \"ID\"
If you find the summonable horse annoying use the consol to it and it will behave like a normal horse.

Hope you like it ! feel free to make texture variation or use them in other mods, just gimme some credits :)
[youtube]Nd4OfllLHlQ[/youtube][youtube]Gw3fs5niYgY[/youtube][youtube]BalmVxZ6PxI[/youtube]
author: Christian Paskota
